commits.author: Mark Robert Miller
commits.sourceNew: @Override  public boolean incrementToken() throws IOException {    if (offsetCount < offsetLimit && input.incrementToken()) {      int offsetLength = offsetAttrib.endOffset() - offsetAttrib.startOffset();      offsetCount += offsetLength;      return true;    }    return false;  }
